name: Defend the Cabin
description:
In this tower defense game your goal is to keep as many animals away from the cabin as possible.

You have 10 different forests you can play in.

There are 10 types of animals in these forests, each with different speed, resistance and strength.

Replace trees or already bought towers with towers you think are the best for your strategy or each position.

Towers cost points, you get points for each animal that has too much damage.

Some animals prefer the day, other animals prefer the night, click on the respective symbol if animals get too close and you want to make them sleep.

A round ends after you let too many animals through and the cabin gets destroyed.
